title: Murder trial begins for Peter Greene, accused with Darren Couper of fatal Auckland attack on Kevin Hay
transTitle: 彼得·格林 (Peter Greene) 谋杀案审判开始，他与达伦·库珀 (Darren Couper) 一起被控在奥克兰袭击凯文·海 (Kevin Hay) 致死

title: Hawke’s Bay under weather watch with severe thunderstorms, strong winds forecast
transTitle: 霍克斯湾正在接受天气监测，预计有严重雷暴和强风

title: Nikki Haley beats Donald Trump in Washington DC for first primary victory
transTitle: 尼基·黑利 (Nikki Haley) 在华盛顿特区击败唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 赢得初选首场胜利

title: Palmerston North buses go 100% electric, in first for NZ
transTitle: 北帕默斯顿公交车 100% 电动化，为新西兰首例

title: Auckland police officer charged after death of fleeing motorcyclist
transTitle: 奥克兰警察因逃跑的摩托车手死亡而被指控

title: Redwoods to get the chop at Wellington Botanic Garden ki Paekākā
transTitle: 惠灵顿植物园的红杉树将获得青睐

title: UK grandfather facing deportation for failing to declare criminal past allowed to remain in NZ
transTitle: 英国祖父因未申报犯罪记录而面临被驱逐出境，允许留在新西兰

title: Long-tailed bat the weight of a AAA battery believed to be NZ's oldest
transTitle: 长尾蝙蝠的重量相当于一节 AAA 电池，据信是新西兰最古老的蝙蝠

title: Bluecliffs erosion state of emergency extended another week
transTitle: 蓝崖侵蚀紧急状态再延长一周
